snippet.title: Space Pirate Trainer – E3 2018 Announce Trailer | PS VR
snippet.description:
Space Pirate Trainer is coming to PS VR in 2018!
Remember those awesome classic arcade cabinets?
Imagine if those were immersive... Space Pirate Trainer puts you in one of those; fighting off relentless waves of droids with all the weapons and gadgets you would ever need as a space pirate. You better dodge some of those incoming lasers though, since just using your shields won't get you in the top rankings. Pick up your blasters, put on your sneakers, and dance your way into the Space Pirate Trainer hall of fame. 

spacepiratetrainer.com
